ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] wizard issues (sorry for crosspost) trying for large  audience
ygData.msgSnippet: I quit a level 29 wizard to start a rogue back in July.  Never missed the wizard, not nearly as fun as the rogue.  Wizards just nuke and med... Kinda boring
ygData.messageBody:
I quit a level 29 wizard to start a rogue back in July. Never missed the
wizard, not nearly as fun as the rogue. Wizards just nuke and med... Kinda
boring IMO, but, hey, that's what a wizard is. Playing a rogue in combat
is more interactive than any other character. You are constantly moving
around trying to backstab the mob, its quite fun.

At 06:38 AM 3/22/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "K" <hoffmann@...>
>
>
>
>I dont know. I played one, along with most of the other classes.
>Wizards ARE balanced....period.
>This sounds like another "Make my class more powerful, and more like
>XYZ class" kinda thread.
>Dont like an aspect of a class? Dont play it.
>But, hey....you cant make everybody happy, can ya?
